entry.title: Dashboard Maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 7, 21:00 - 22:00 UTC

Aug 23, 22:29 UTC
Scheduled - The Cloudflare Dashboard will be unavailable during this maintenance window in order to improve future resiliency of the system. All dashboard UI actions will be unavailable during the window.

entry.title: Increased HTTP 5xx Errors
entry.content:
Aug 24, 23:10 UTC
Resolved - Cloudflare has experienced an increased level of HTTP 5xx errors from around 22:20 - 22:23 UTC in our ARN (Stockholm) data center

entry.title: Magic Transit Degraded Performance
entry.content:
Aug 24, 23:00 UTC
Resolved - A retro incident has been declared related to Magic Transit. Impacted customers who have origin behind magic transit may see 530/522 in APAC region through Singapore data center. The impact of event is from 08-24 23:05 UTC to 08-25 01:13 UTC

The impact has been mitigated.

entry.title: Network Performance Issues in TPE
entry.content:
Aug 24, 17:57 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 24, 14:36 UTC
Update - We are continuing to monitor the situation regarding network performance in Taipei.

Aug 24, 08:28 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Aug 24, 08:28 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 24, 06:36 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with network performance in Taipei.

We are working to analyse and mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.

entry.title: Cloudflare Dashboard issues
entry.content:
Aug 24, 03:47 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 24, 03:24 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with Cloudflare Dashboard.

IP Access Rules page has a long button in Firefox which is preventing Firefox users to add new rules.
Recommendation: Please use another browser like Safari, Chrome.

These issues do not affect the serving of cached files via the Cloudflare CDN or other security features at the Cloudflare Edge.

Customers using the Dashboard are impacted as requests might fail and/or errors may be displayed.

entry.title: Network Analytics Delays
entry.content:
Aug 23, 10:06 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 23, 09:28 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Aug 23, 08:46 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 23, 06:20 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Aug 23, 06:18 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is aware of, and investigating a delay with Network analytics. Further detail will be provided as more information becomes available.

entry.title: Cloudflare Dashboard IP access rule UI issue
entry.content:
Aug 21, 01:28 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 21, 01:04 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with Cloudflare Dashboard firewall IP access rule UI. Customer may experience pagination of IP access rule not fully display on the UI

These issues do not affect the serving of cached files via the Cloudflare CDN or other security features at the Cloudflare Edge.

Customers using the IP access rule Dashboard are impacted, but customers can still use API to create IP access rules.

entry.title: Increased HTTP 502/504 Errors in ISB and LHE
entry.content:
Aug 20, 22:04 UTC
Resolved - Cloudflare is investigating an increased level of HTTP 502/504 errors.

Cloudflare has resolved the issue and services have resumed normal operation.

entry.title: TLS termination failures for some China customers
entry.content:
Aug 20, 20:17 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 20, 19:16 UTC
Identified - Some China customers Edge requests are experiencing TLS Termination failures. The Cloudflare team has identified an issue and working on applying the fix.

entry.title: Customer Impacting Issue
entry.content:
Aug 19, 19:34 UTC
Resolved - Cloudflare has resolved the issue and services have resumed normal operation.

Aug 19, 18:47 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented, and we are monitoring the results.

Aug 19, 18:37 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified, and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 19, 18:31 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is aware of, and investigating, an issue which potentially impacts multiple customers using Workers in our Toronto and Lisbon data centers. Further detail will be provided as more information becomes available.

entry.title: Cloudflare Logs Delays
entry.content:
Aug 19, 05:48 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 19, 05:40 UTC
Monitoring - A fix had been identified and we are monitoring the results.

Aug 19, 05:01 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is observing delays in processing Cloudflare logs (formerly ELS).

We are currently working on a resolution. More updates to follow shortly.

entry.title: DNS hostname change failed to clean up the old record
entry.content:
Aug 18, 18:00 UTC
Resolved - Between 17:58 UTC on 7/30/2021 and 17:18 UTC on 8/17/2021, we identified and fixed an issue related to failure to clean up old records after hostname update that impacted some zones behind Cloudflare. We are going through a thorough process to ensure there are no other zones affected.

entry.title: Firewall Configuration Update Delays
entry.content:
Aug 18, 14:51 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 18, 14:11 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Aug 18, 13:28 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is aware of, and investigating an issue which might cause some firewall configurations delay at being published.

Further detail will be provided as more information becomes available.

entry.title: Cloudflare for Teams: Gateway Issues
entry.content:
Aug 17, 19:03 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 17, 18:52 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Aug 17, 18:23 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with the DNS Resolver component within Gateway. Performance and connectivity through Gateway may be impacted.

We are working to understand the full impact and mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.

entry.title: Elevated failure rates for Cron Triggers
entry.content:
Aug 17, 17:30 UTC
Resolved - On 2021/08/17 from 16:30 to 17:13 UTC, Cron Triggers experienced high failure rates. Cloudflare is investigating the extent of these failures.

entry.title: Users unable to establish new sessions in the Cloudflare for Teams Dashboard
entry.content:
Aug 17, 13:20 UTC
Resolved - Users trying to establish new sessions in the Cloudflare for Teams Dashboard were unable to authenticate. This issue has been resolved and users are now able to sign-in without issue.
The impact has been observed between 13:20 and 14:06.

entry.title: Durable Objects timeouts
entry.content:
Aug 16, 23:42 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 16, 21:08 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues related to network connectivity to Durable Objects.

entry.title: Cloudflare for Teams: Gateway Issues
entry.content:
Aug 16, 20:29 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 16, 20:26 UTC
Update - Cloudflare has implemented a fix for this issue and is currently monitoring the results.

Aug 16, 20:25 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Aug 16, 20:09 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with the HTTP proxy component within Gateway. Performance and connectivity through Gateway may be impacted.

We are working to understand the full impact and mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.

We will update the status once we implement the fix.

Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with network performance in Atlanta.

We are working to analyse and mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.

entry.title: Durable Objects timeouts
entry.content:
Aug 13, 02:21 UTC
Resolved - Cloudflare has resolved the issue and services have resumed normal operation.

Aug 12, 21:48 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues related to network connectivity to Durable Objects.

entry.title: Delayed JavaScript challenge passes
entry.content:
Aug 12, 21:31 UTC
Resolved - Cloudflare has resolved the issue and services have resumed normal operation.

Aug 12, 19:16 UTC
Monitoring - Cloudflare has implemented a fix for this issue and is currently monitoring the results.

We will update the status once the issue is resolved.

Aug 12, 17:10 UTC
Identified - Cloudflare has identified the issue and is implementing a fix.

We will update the status once we implement the fix.

Aug 12, 17:10 UTC
Investigating - We are currently observing delays in JavaScript challenge passes. We are investigating further and working on a fix. More updates to follow.

entry.title: Elevated 520 errors on Free Zones
entry.content:
Aug 11, 21:30 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 11, 19:13 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Aug 11, 16:05 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 11, 15:59 UTC
Investigating - We are currently observing elevated 520 errors on our Free zones. We are working to understand the full impact and mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.

entry.title: Issues authenticating using Cloudflare Access in certain data centers
entry.content:
Aug 11, 12:18 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 11, 10:56 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Aug 11, 10:54 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues authenticating into Cloudflare Access

entry.title: Increased errors from the API in saving firewall rules
entry.content:
Aug 11, 08:30 UTC
Resolved - Between 09:10-09:40 UTC, customers would have experienced increased errors from the API in saving firewall rules.

entry.title: Browser Isolation Availability Issues
entry.content:
Aug 10, 21:47 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 10, 20:52 UTC
Monitoring - Cloudflare has implemented a fix for this issue and is currently monitoring the results.

We will update the status once the issue is resolved.

Aug 10, 19:03 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 10, 19:03 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with the Browser Isolation service. Customers that use Browser Isolation may observe errors when attempting to load sites through the service. This issue does not affect any other Cloudflare services.

We are working to mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.
